channel.title: Harriet on tlake.io
channel.description: Recent content in Harriet on tlake.io

item.title: The Walk Without Shame
item.description: The party continues processing the results of their research requests, an unsteady Gimble has some troubling revelations at the Temple of Oghma, and Oneshoe enthusiastically takes one for the team. Just as the party considers leaving to find Nyx, they are granted access to The Emerald Door and the interior of Candlekeep.

item.title: Arrival in Candlekeep
item.description: The party gains entry into Candlekeep and its outer Court of Air, but they are barred investigating the inner library themselves, despite Gimble’s insistence. Instead, they fill out numerous research requests and seek lodging to rest and prepare for what comes next.

item.title: Harriet
item.description: Description Appearance A very human-looking female tiefling. Personality Kinda weird, tbh, not overly burdened with understanding social cues. Biography One of the lower-level assistants of the Avowed in Candlekeep. Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia
